vat.error_text: Please enter your VAT number in the correct format: 10 numbers e.g. 1234567890.

lc_popup_content.nl:
Order by 15.30 and receive the goods on the same day – possible at Distrelec Netherlands, thanks to our warehouse in ‘s-Hertogenbosch!


This delivery option is available for all items marked Same Day


Delivery costs are calculated according to distance and weight.


Please contact our Customer Service Team on +32 2503 3383 for advice, a detailed calculation of delivery costs and confirmation of the desired delivery date.
